name: The People's Tree
description:
Part of the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar. Go check that out!

The People's Tree is an app for designing, pinning, and viewing ornaments on a single, shared tree. Submissions will close in 2021. Act fast and become a part of history! Submit yourself to the People's Tree! 

Game + Code by Colter

3D Modeling by Cyreides

Sound + Music by Bill

Additional Code by VoidGoat

Special Thanks to NCSA, CYI, and the CLOWDER team! 

Visit the tree after 7pm for nightmode! Restart the app to redo your ornament. Hold Esc to quit. Holler for Linux and Mac builds and I might bake some. Mac build is forthcoming - I'm aware its BORK.  Apple made it kinda impossible to make games for MacOS without some serious hoop jumping so I'm sorry friends, it's not coming.
